pageProduct.name: Sukin Sensitive Cleansing Lotion 125ml Pump
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Delicate skin? No worries! Our Sensitive Cleansing Lotion is the perfect cleansing option for dry/dehydrated skin types who have sensitive skin, and works to purify skin by removing impurities and excess oils without stripping delicate skin- win! With Cucumber, Chamomile and Aloe Vera to soothe and hydrate dry skin, while a luscious blend of Rosehip, Jojoba, Avocado Oils with Vitamin E help to leave skin feeling clean, soft and nourished. TIP: If your skin is very dehydrated, follow with a few drops of our Organic Rosehip Oil and our Sensitive Facial Moisturiser or Calming Night Cream

Warnings

e.g. Avoid contact with the eyes and rinse immediately if contact occurs. If irritation occurs rinse immediately and discontinue use. For external use only.

Common Uses

Naturally created for Sensitive Skin, this range features calming Chamomile, Aloe Vera & Cucumber to cool and soothe dry skin. Developed without potentially skin irritating essential oils, this range features a subtle scent of Vanilla to ensure that sensitive skin is not left irritated

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile), Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (Rosehip), Vanillin, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Massage into damp skin in a gentle circular motion. Remove with cotton wool or a warm face cloth and pat skin dry. It is water-soluble which makes it ideal to use in the shower. Use once or twice daily.
